nodes.text: Extract total RNA from at least 2 x 106 cells using TRIZOL reagent and the appropriate RNeasy RNA extraction kit
Reverse-transcribe 60 ng of total RNA with a High-capacity cDNA Reverse Transcription kit in a reaction volume of 200 microl
Prepare a reaction mix \(25 μl) according to the following recipe: 2X Sybr Green PCR Master Mix - 12,5 microl 1 μM primer mix - 2,5 microl cDNA \(5 ng/microl) - 2 microl water - 8 microl
Perform Real-Time PCR on 10 ng of cDNA using a Power Sybr Green PCR Master MIX
Start the ampli�cation procedure according to the following standard 7500 run protocol: 50°C \(2min) - 95°C \(10min) - 95°C \ (15sec), 60°C \(1min), 40 cycles - 95°C \(15sec), 60°C
Perform a dissociation assay to evaluate any problem related to primer unspeci�c annealing or secondary structure formation
Analyze data with built-in SDS Analysis Software.
